translations: v．下赌注，打赌：在某事的结果上投注金钱或其他物品。
· He wagered a large sum of money on the outcome of the game.
他在比赛结果上下了一大笔赌注。

sentences.sentence: She always wagered on an outsider.
sentences.translation: 她总是把赌注押在不大可能获胜的马上。

sentences.sentence: They wagered a lot of money on the race.
sentences.translation: 他们在这次赛跑上押了很多钱。

sentences.sentence: I had wagered a great deal of money that I would beat him.
sentences.translation: 我下了大赌注打赌，赌这次比赛我会赢他的。
